title: Technical Capabilities and GitHub Integration
description: Information about Tomasz Weber's technical implementation skills and the advanced features of this chat system

entries.content:
This AI chat system demonstrates advanced technical integration capabilities:

- GitHub OAuth authentication for user identification
- Automatic conversation logging to GitHub repository issues
- Real-time administration through GitHub API
- Professional integration showing technical expertise
- Live knowledge base updates through version control
- Auto-engagement: Chat opens automatically after 5 seconds to encourage interaction
- Smart user interaction tracking to prevent intrusive behavior
- Animated visual cues with CSS animations

Users can log in with GitHub to get personalized responses, and all important conversations are automatically documented in the repository for analysis and improvement.

The portfolio website showcases practical implementation of:

- AI/ML integration with OpenAI GPT-4
- OAuth 2.0 authentication flows
- RESTful API development
- GitHub API integration and webhooks
- Serverless deployment on Vercel
- Modern JavaScript and responsive web design
- Automated logging and analytics systems

This demonstrates not just marketing expertise, but also hands-on technical implementation skills.

The source code is available at: https://github.com/tomekweber-eng/digital-tomek

This repository contains the full implementation of the portfolio website and AI chat system, demonstrating transparent development practices and technical competency.

Through the GitHub integration, this chat system can be updated and modified in real-time. Knowledge base changes, feature additions, and system improvements can be made directly through the conversation interface, demonstrating advanced automation and CI/CD practices.

Recent live updates include: Auto-open functionality after 5 seconds, violet branding for the Send button to match brand colors, and enhanced user engagement features.
